## MSAARenderPass.setSize() method

Resize the internal render target to match the new size specified.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @override */
setSize(width: number, height: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | number | New width to apply to the render target. |
|  height | number | New height to apply to the render target. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
